lender.name: Kristin
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference for someone who just needs a little help.
lender.occupational_info: I help customers know what products my company sells

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I loan because I am lucky enough to be able too. While I am not rich, I work hard and am able to share what I have with others. People who gets loans from kiva work hard too and deserve a chance to get ahead.
lender.occupational_info: My wife and I have a small farm in rural Wisconsin. We raise cattle for beef and milk, goats for meat and milk, chickens for meat and eggs, and geese to alert us of trouble in the farmyard (and for meat and eggs). We have a large garden and produce enough food to sell as well as share with freinds and neighbors. I teach children and adults how to tend a garden and care for animals of their own.

lender.name: Seth
lender.loan_because: My money can go to useless non-essentials in my everyday life, or it can do a small part in changing a life, or the world.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: I think microfinance is a great way to provide people in developing countries with the opportunity to choose their future.

lender.name: Kimberly
lender.loan_because: God is very to me and I want to give back.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves hope!
lender.occupational_info: I work with orphanages in Liberia supporting skills training and capacity-building activities in Agriculture, Animal Husbandry and Microenterprise.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I realise that others may not have the same financial opportunities that we have. I would like to help change that.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: I am blessed.

lender.name: Vicki
lender.loan_because: I am a woman who knows what a difference a loan can make.
lender.occupational_info: Everyday, I am in an office taking care of all of the things that make a business work.

lender.name: Brett
lender.loan_because: Very simple way to help people who are trying to make a better life for themselves and their families, but don't have many opportunities.

lender.name: Gail and Sid
lender.loan_because: Our lives have been so fortunate. How can we ignore those who are not?

lender.name: gina
lender.loan_because: it is one of the most elementary concepts to me: I have and someone needs. Why wouldn't I help? I think microfinance is one of the most amazingly simple ways for us in the "developed" world to reach out and help those who are needlessly impoverished.

lender.name: Rose
lender.loan_because: I Can.

lender.name: Sonni
lender.loan_because: I know I am very lucky with my life- making a loan is my way to make someone others life a little more sunny!
lender.occupational_info: I work in a branch of a german bank- its my daily buisness to give loans to other people. I know the problem that people who really need money, don't get that (or even not for a fair interest).

lender.name: Christina & Terrell
lender.loan_because: I think it is important to help other people out as I have been helped by others.

lender.name: Carl
lender.loan_because: I would like to help other people to help themselves
lender.occupational_info: I install and service large computer systems

lender.name: Gabriela
lender.loan_because: I know that indeed a little help can go a very very long way!!!!

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: Giving back. My grandfather always went out of his way to help others.
lender.occupational_info: Commercial Real Estate

lender.name: patrick&micky
lender.loan_because: We like to contribute to entrepreneurs in Africa by offering micro loans.Great pro of this system is effectiveness and follow up.

lender.name: Heike
lender.loan_because: I believe in in chances.

lender.name: Elise
lender.loan_because: it's important to give back

lender.name: Seth
lender.loan_because: Promoting an Entrepreneurial Spirit is One of the Greatest Gifts

lender.name: Chris Lema
lender.loan_because: I love the simple things that we can all do to make differences in people's lives.
lender.occupational_info: I coach teams of people. Sometimes it's to build a program for a computer, sometimes it's to put on an event, and sometimes it's to share a message to a church or the world.

lender.name: Shari
lender.loan_because: Helping people is awesome. There's no higher calling.
lender.occupational_info: I raise funds for World Vision to help children in need.

lender.name: Erica
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves the opportunity better their lives.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: Kiva is a good idea
lender.occupational_info: I use the computer all day to write analysis of interest rate markets in America.

lender.name: Jim & Elaine
lender.loan_because: we would like to assist you with your business ventures. Best of luck in your future.
lender.occupational_info: Jim owns a plumbing and heating business. Elaine owns a cloth diaper service.

lender.name: Jenniffer
lender.loan_because: I believe people are asking for a helping hand and not a handout. I am thankful I have the opportunity to make a difference in anyone's life.

lender.name: Katharina
lender.loan_because: we need to work at change one day at a time
lender.occupational_info: I work for a large urban university, with students from over 100 nations.

lender.name: Vera
lender.loan_because: I believe in empowering women and girls to lift themselves out of poverty.

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: I really believe that more people would be able to live productive lives with just a little help.
lender.occupational_info: Currently I stay home and watch my grandchildren. In the past I worked at a Montessori School, for financial planners and a title insurance company.

lender.name: Penn & Peg
lender.occupation: Social Justice but we have other jobs as well.
lender.loan_because: because we care. We believe we can make a difference one neighbor at a time whether it is next door or across the ocean.
lender.occupational_info: Peg is an Executive Director of a not-for-profit adult literacy organization. Penn is a Hospital Administrator for an animal hospital.

lender.name: Brent
lender.loan_because: it can make a difference.

lender.name: Becky
lender.loan_because: I'd like to see the alleviation of poverty in the world, and I think the equity of access to capital is one of the many means to achieving that goal.
lender.occupational_info: I manage the business operations for a small nonprofit and also work as a project manager for web marketing for another nonprofit.

lender.name: Capri & Jason
lender.loan_because: "What do we live for, if not to make life less difficult for each other?" - George Eliot

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: i can.

lender.name: Anne
lender.loan_because: I love supporting other entrepreneurs, and believe everyone deserves a good quality of life.
lender.occupational_info: I show entrepreneurs how to turn their passion into income and teach strategies to leverage their business in a way that gives them more time with what matters most to them.

lender.name: Pockets Of Change
lender.loan_because: Our mission includes using the power of microloans to make measurable changes in local economies and to alleviate poverty.

lender.name: Jill
lender.loan_because: sharing makes us all part of the same community

lender.name: Carolyn
lender.loan_because: it's easy- it has an impact- it helps someone directly. It just makes sense.

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: To improve the world in which we live in.
lender.occupational_info: English teacher in China.

lender.name: The Hortons
lender.loan_because: I like to help others to help themselves

lender.name: Kirsten & Gavin
lender.loan_because: we can help people help themselves.

lender.name: Thomasina
lender.loan_because: I have seem enough of the world that I want to make a difference.

lender.name: Ngoc
lender.loan_because: I am where I am today due to other people's generosity. It's time for me to pay it forward.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: i give a damn!!!

lender.name: Pablo
lender.occupation: Lic. en Ciecnias y Tecnología de ALimentos

lender.name: Ron and Marni
lender.loan_because: Simply put; I want to help.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Canadian but I live and work in Southern California.

lender.name: Senia
lender.loan_because: I want to help someone
lender.occupational_info: I'm a physics student, studying to get a doctor degree. Mostly doing research in the lab, feeling happy about it!

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: it helps so many and makes such a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I design interior spaces, which is why I have a soft spot for those trying to make their own homes wherever they are in the world.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: We lost our son, Lyle, and wanted to do something in his name.
lender.occupational_info: Helping schools and non-profit organizations prove their worth to the people who gave them grants.

lender.name: Viancca Cerati
lender.loan_because: Because i can.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a private Defense company. I spend a lot of my time in front of a computer enforcing the security and operations. My drive to work is about 30 minutes, 15 of those stuck in freeway traffic. I hope to one day escape my 8am-5om schedule.

lender.name: Doug Wong
lender.loan_because: I want to pay it forward!
lender.occupational_info: I enjoy helping creative people who are passionate about their work. I work mostly with musicians, writers and film makers.

lender.name: Fallon
lender.loan_because: I think you can never be too young to help make this world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: Eat, sleep, play, tantrum. Lather, rinse, repeat.

lender.name: Aimee
lender.loan_because: I believe that people with ideas who want to work hard should be able to realize their dreams. I am grateful to help in the facilitation of these efforts.
lender.occupational_info: I sing and play music all day.

lender.name: Melanie
lender.loan_because: I have needed help in my life too.
lender.occupational_info: Public works construction projects for the Los Angeles Neighborhood Initiative (LANI) in the City of Los Angeles. LANI selects neglected neighborhoods for beautification projects such as new parks, facade improvements, landscaping, bus shelters and lighting to improve the community and increase neighborhood pride.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: sometimes people need a little help and a little help can go a long way.

lender.name: Simone
lender.loan_because: enabling people to support themselves has a much greater effect than just providing them with goods

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: Spread the wealth
lender.occupational_info: I work with cameras and electronics, on various events and productions, i.e. concerts.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I am the LENDER and not the Borrower according to Deut 28:1-18. It is a part of the Blessing of Abraham. I want to help people in the Name of Jesus.
lender.occupational_info: I minister in Churches 37 weeks out of the year. Lending free from interest is a Bible Principle.

lender.name: Kari
lender.loan_because: I believe in empowering people, help them to become active and in charge of their own lives.

lender.name: BOYANI
lender.loan_because: I would like to see every single individual prospering in any region thus eradicate poverty and raise the living standards of the people in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am Boyani Onuonga from Kisii Kenya aged 33 and single mother with one kid Noel Arekwa Kelonye aged 9yrs. I am a businesswoman dealing with second hand clothes. Due to lack of adequate capital I do select my stock from those that open up the bales, then sell to get a small profit for my daily upkeep. My future plans is that if i can get $500 to secure up a business premise where i can sell my mitumba clothes in bales and eventually have a saloon. God bless you as you plan to assist

lender.name: Claus F. Berthold
lender.loan_because: It is one world and I hope everybody can start each day with a smile, because that's my business.
lender.occupational_info: Help people start working with a smile.

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: I want to support women entrepreneurs in developing nations.
lender.occupational_info: I am a registrar and secretary at a private school in Cambridge, MA

lender.name: Tanja
lender.loan_because: Giving a loan through Kiva is one of the best things I have ever heard of!
lender.occupational_info: I work in the sales department of a mechanical engineering company in Germany.

lender.name: Paul and Nyree
lender.loan_because: with great blessing comes greater responsibility!

lender.name: Afke
lender.loan_because: It's great to help provide the means for people with no access to regular financial institutions to create a better life for themselves. So little for us means so much to them :)

lender.name: Alvin
lender.loan_because: Its the Jedi thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I help people.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I hope and believe that I can make a difference.

lender.name: sarah
lender.loan_because: i would like to help.
lender.occupational_info: i am a train guard in sydney, australia. i operate train doors, manage timetabling and assist customer service and meet lots of people.

lender.name: Kimberly
lender.loan_because: I want to help make a difference in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am a full-time college student, and I also work in one of the departments at my college.

lender.name: Create Folios
lender.loan_because: We want to help other people to take care of themselves and their families, and to encourage other entrepreneurs.
lender.occupational_info: We offer a range of web and print design services to artists, makers, and other creatives, to help them to market their work and develop their careers, through the production of online portfolios, catalogues, CVs and other business tools.

lender.name: Kristie
lender.loan_because: I have had so many people selflessly support and encourage me. As a widow and small business owner, I know that times can be difficult. But seeing these lovely people in third world countries trying to make it for themselves... My heart goes out to them and I'm so pleased to be able to help, even if it's just a little at a time.
lender.occupational_info: I live with about 40 dogs. Some are mine, many belong to other people. I take care of them and train them to be wonderful companions.

lender.name: Matt Dustin
lender.loan_because: I want to help.

lender.name: Clyde
lender.occupational_info: I work for a company that manufactures aircraft components. I have been a pilot for many years.

lender.name: Tracy
lender.occupational_info: I am small business owner of a successful IT consulting company. We provide technical services to companies and government agencies.

lender.name: Doc, Marci, Trey, and Shockley
lender.loan_because: It is rewarding to see your money help people build a business

lender.name: JP Folz
lender.loan_because: Opportunity should be available to everyone.
lender.occupational_info: Work with teams, leaders and organizations to transform the way in which they do business to be sustainable in their people, profit, purpose and for the planet.

lender.name: The Alder Group
lender.loan_because: We very much appreciate the concept of and now the ability to support people who, often despite extremely difficult circumstances, dig deep to find the energy and the will to take one step after the other in the direction of hope and self-empowerment. What a gift we now have to be able to help others not just locally, but around the world. A fantastic opportunity for Individuals, families and organizations.
lender.occupational_info: Canadian consulting firm.

lender.name: Jill
lender.loan_because: i like helping people.
lender.occupational_info: I do so many things. I am a full-time professor and department chairperson; a part-time writer, editor and public speaker. I do business consulting (marketing, public relations, and general business advising).

lender.name: Joanne
lender.loan_because: I am blessed with a good life and I would like to pay it forward.
lender.occupational_info: I sell houses, invest in realestate and manage properties.

lender.name: Madison
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who are less fortunate than me.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student.

lender.name: Elvi
lender.loan_because: Because so little can go very far :o)

lender.name: Steph
lender.loan_because: I can, and I like to help people help themselves
lender.occupational_info:
I am president of Canadian webhosting service, Hey Tommy, which hosts your site in Canada. We strive to be environmentally friendly. We offer no contract secure reliable hosting.
I am an avid gardener and have a personable recipe blog for people with wheat allergies like myself http://www.treatswithoutwheat.com

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I love the concept of micro lending. It makes it possible for ordinary folks to help ordinary folks. The personal connection that is created by this relationship is a seed planted for world peace.
lender.occupational_info: I co-own a digital imaging business with my husband. We have been in operation for 33 years, have 15 employees and currently about 2000 customers. We work with artists and photographers who sell their work at art shows and in galleries. We are also very involved with conservation artists and photographers who are working on behalf of the environment and for protection of indigenous cultures.

lender.name: Sandra
lender.loan_because: I want to lift up women to succeed at the level they dream to.

lender.name: Vikki
lender.loan_because: I must live the change I want to see in the World by circulating generosity and giving to my fellow brothers and sisters.
lender.occupational_info: Assisting clients with locating and procuring locations for their businesses

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I believe economic development is the best way to overcome poverty and I want people all over the world to have access to education.
lender.occupational_info: I teach U.S. History to 10th grade students which means they are 15 and 16 years old and American Government to students in 12th grade who are 17 and 18 years old.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: it makes me happy. It takes so little to help someone else.
lender.occupational_info: I try to make everyone happy- clients with the services we provide, team members with the jobs they have, management with the jobs we do.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: It's great to see how a little bit can go a long way!

lender.name: Fabian
lender.loan_because: I want to say thank you for the fortune in my life (e.g. being born in a wealthy, democratic country)
lender.occupational_info: I work for companies to improve their processes. Besides my job, I like to make sports and enjoy the nature :-)

lender.name: Kali
lender.loan_because: This is a great way to help people and see where the moneys going and to keep it circulating.
lender.occupational_info: I help people get to where they want to be in their lifes.

lender.name: Tania-René
lender.loan_because: I want to empower people.
lender.occupational_info: My passion is educating people to make our planet a healthy place to live. I connect people to make a difference.

lender.name: Umesh
lender.occupation: Asset Mgmt., CleanTech, Amateur field biologist

lender.name: Elisa
lender.loan_because: I would like to help people who have less than me. I like to see who I am loaning to and be able to support specific activities.
lender.occupational_info: I answer phones, run errands, and work on the computer.

lender.name: Seahawks Powerhouse!
lender.loan_because: I like to help others! Did I say like, I meant I LOVE to help others. Go Seahawks!

lender.name: Allison
lender.loan_because: I want to help the world go round
lender.occupational_info: I educate and coordinate in my community to promote "clean and green" by organizing litter cleanups & tree plantings.

lender.name: Foley
lender.loan_because: I bartend and recieve tips, most of which, I don't need, so why use a bank?
lender.occupational_info: I sell beer to people and listen to their stories. I bartend and create art and music.

lender.name: Robyn
lender.loan_because: of "the promise of the future", because "if there is no promise, there is no meaningful history. Significance is contingent on vision and anticipation, on living the future in the present tense." ~ Abraham Joshua Heschel
lender.occupational_info: Society teaches that nothing we think is original. So I'm learning how I should have thought originally.

lender.name: Rose
lender.loan_because: everyone should have the opportunity to benefit from their own hard work.
lender.occupational_info: These loans are made in memory of a hard-working woman who gave her children and grandchildren access to education, encouragement and belief in themselves.

lender.name: Harry Sherman
lender.occupational_info: I'm currently a student enrolled full time in high school.

lender.name: Ryan and Katelynn
lender.loan_because: We have advantages in life and along with these comes a responsibility to support others who have been overlooked, abused, neglected, and left out.

lender.name: John Latimer
lender.loan_because: it makes a difference in peoples lives. Who else is going to do it?
lender.occupational_info: I make computer chips....

lender.name: Holly
lender.loan_because: It's good.
lender.occupational_info: I educate people in the United States about global hunger. I empower them to contact their elected officials.

lender.name: Tammy
lender.loan_because: I am a business owner and know what a loan can do to start a successful business.

lender.name: Lee & Megan
lender.loan_because: Acts 20:35 "In Everything I did, I showed you that we must work hard & help the weak. We must remember the words of Lord Jesus. He said, "It is more blessed to give than to receive.""

lender.name: stellaslove
lender.loan_because: Teach a man to fish and all that....
lender.occupational_info: I work with children who have suffered significant abuse within their family and are displaying challenging behaviours as a result.

lender.name: Jamie
lender.loan_because: Its a great way to help someone with an entrepreneurial spirit to get up and running and make a living for themselves in areas of the world that need assistance.
lender.occupational_info: Real Estate Construction Lending for a major Canadian Bank.

lender.name: Miriam
lender.loan_because: I like knowing that the money I loan can make a positive difference in people's lives. I also like seeing the photos, seeing who these people are.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English to college students from all over the world. I think I sometimes learn as much from my students as they learn from me.

lender.name: Jordan
lender.loan_because: I love people, business, and the opportunity to help.
lender.occupational_info: I service insurance policies.

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: I feel it is more than important for every one in this world to have an equal chance, with all the indulgences I have been given within my life, I feel it is a necessity to give back.

lender.name: Fletch
lender.whereabouts: Tweed Heads South New South Wales
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Kate
lender.loan_because: I want to help people throughout the world in a way that is renewable and encourages self-sufficiency

lender.name: Shin
lender.loan_because: It costs me so little to make a difference in somebody else's life. And I'd want somebody to do this for me if I were in need of a chance to fend for myself.
lender.occupational_info: I don't work at the moment because I'm too busy trying to stay alive. I have late-stage cancer.

lender.name: DreamWeaver
lender.loan_because: everyone can make a difference in the betterment of the planet
lender.occupational_info: Being an example of living in balance with the humans, animals, plants, and earth.

lender.name: Cindy
lender.loan_because: I believe in the enterprising spirit of people, and the difference they make in the lives of their families.
lender.occupational_info: I am a CPA, an accountant

lender.name: Caitlin
lender.loan_because: I can't imagine being a Mum in some of the places in this world. If I can make life easier for just one other family out there who hasn't been as lucky as mine, I can even out the score a bit.
lender.occupational_info: My job is one performed everywhere! I think every other parent out there knows what it is like.

lender.name: Karen Kocik
lender.loan_because: I have started several businesses and I know how great it feels to be independent and provide for your family.
lender.occupational_info: Basically I am a "handywoman", a person who can repair and beautify a dwelling, inside and out. Primarily I paint the inside of houses for people who live in them. As an artist I create art not just by technique but with a bit of soul!

lender.name: Vivian
lender.loan_because: this is in line with that give-a-man-a-fish/teach-a-man-to-fish proverb and what's cooler than that?
lender.occupational_info: I work at a hospital doing nothing nearly as badass as these people

lender.name: KaraLea
lender.loan_because: I want everyone to have the opportunity to succeed

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: .... love wins....
lender.occupational_info: connecting others

lender.name: Tnika
lender.loan_because: I wanted to help people in my parents country and other parts of the world. I have been fortunate enough to grow up and be educated in the United States. I want to give a little back that has been given to me. :)
lender.occupational_info: sculptor

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I like seeing capitalism used for the "powers of good", and being a part of a democratic and decentralised movement of people helping people. Microloans are a fantastic idea, and I'll support a good idea whenever I come across it.
lender.occupational_info: I work for myself, finding development opportunities and investing in them.

lender.name: EVAN
lender.loan_because: Some people deserve a chance to work to better their lives... maybe I can help give someone that chance
lender.occupational_info: I go to college and hold a part time job as a page at a library, where I shelve books and do various other small but essential tasks

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: I am fascinated with the design of microfinancing, and I have some extra money to lend right now. I am also interested in going into a field where kiva would be very useful.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a homeless shelter right now, and my job is one of talking with, working with and loving the lepers of American society.

lender.name: CatDog
lender.loan_because: I was inspired by the "KIVA" concept and hopefully make a difference
lender.occupational_info: I am a Teacher's assistant and work with children with challenges

lender.name: Dara
lender.loan_because: I believe that it is important to support the dreams and ambitions of our global friends and neighbors.

lender.name: Jane
lender.loan_because: I believe in the individual and the human spirit to get ahead through hard work and creativity.
lender.occupational_info: I buy cute stuffed animals and figurines from all over &sell them in my store.

lender.name: Mandy
lender.loan_because: My Mum always said to me, life is more rewarding when you can help others and not expect recognition for it because it is not always about you.
lender.occupational_info: Working in a specialised medical practice, I encounter people everyday who have life threatening conditions. My doctors can sometimes help with their conditions but my place is to make them comfortable and help them in any way I can.

lender.name: Ben
lender.loan_because: I'm a middle-class citizen in Australia, which gives me great privileges and opportunities. If I can offer a few dollars to help someone in a less fortunate nation build up their business, then I've done something valuable in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I use email direct marketing to promote Women and Leadership Forums around Australia.

lender.name: Laura & Ephraim
lender.loan_because: We all need a little help sometimes.
lender.occupational_info: Ephraim builds houses, Laura helps sick people at the hospital.

lender.name: Gregory
lender.loan_because: I want to promote capitalism and freedom.
lender.occupational_info: I own and manage an appliance repair business.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: I am blessed to be able to do work that i love and I want others to have that same opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: I work in free-lance production, making television commercials and shows. I also film weddings, family events, etc.

lender.name: Suzi
lender.loan_because: I think the very best way to help defeat poverty is to support those who want to improve their lives.

lender.name: Kiva TMSI Divas
lender.loan_because: It's a great way to 'give back' and make a difference in the world.

lender.name: ethan g.
lender.occupation: retired; [now bird watch around the world!]
lender.loan_because: i want to help make the world a better place, especially for women.....
lender.occupational_info: retired but still learning every day.....

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: the only way we can make a difference in the world is one person at a time with our motivation being the love of Jesus...
lender.occupational_info: I work in an Emergency Department. I also have a foundation for that we are developing to address the needs of orphans and adopted children.

lender.name: Wempy Dyocta Koto
lender.loan_because: There is no dignity in living with or being a bystander to poverty.

lender.name: Ronnie
lender.loan_because: I was once in the Start up phase of my business.
lender.occupational_info: Small greeting card designer that has grown quickly due to personalized service.

lender.name: Tyler
lender.loan_because: It makes a difference and gives someone else the chance to do the same.
lender.occupational_info: I am a teacher.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: i believe
lender.occupational_info: I study economics and Spanish to be able to someday work with the poor in Latin America.

lender.name: Laura
lender.occupational_info: I translate Spanish into English to help build connections around the world

lender.name: Elisa
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me so that I may share those blessings with others.

lender.name: C.F.
lender.loan_because:
The ability to give to another who truly desire to achieve more and do more is awesome.
It's even more extraordinary when the gift given is appreciated no matter the amount because it's truly appreciated.

lender.name: Megan
lender.loan_because: I am hoping to start giving gift certificates to my friends and family to loan
lender.occupational_info: I am a 'business doctor' of sorts. I assess business problems for companies and help resolve them.

lender.name: Melinda
lender.loan_because: I love Kiva. It makes it possible for me to learn about very special people so I can offer them practical and emotional support.
lender.occupational_info: I love finding and selling vintage clothes, accessories, shoes and collectibles.

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: Anyone who wants to try to improve their family's life should have the chance to.

lender.name: George
lender.loan_because: I'm fortunate enough to do so
lender.occupational_info: I'm a writer and journalist

lender.name: Cat & Pat
lender.loan_because:
We think we have to do it, so we do
Thanks for your projects

lender.name: Ben
lender.loan_because: I've achieved wonderful things based on the generosity of others, so I want to use what I've been given to empower people.
lender.occupational_info: I study mathematics.

lender.name: Rhonda
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in someone's life.

lender.name: Karsten
lender.loan_because: its christmas
lender.occupational_info: Trust me, I'm a banker!

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: it makes sense
lender.occupational_info: Account Management - Advertising

lender.name: Rachel
lender.loan_because: "More and more, we are discovering that everyone and everything is interconnected. What hurts you hurts me. What heals you heals me." - Desmond Tutu
lender.occupational_info: I'm passionate about continually learning more about children, living in the city, and what social justice and service really look like.

lender.name: Dipali
lender.loan_because:
I believe.
I am very much part of a corporate environment and until recently all my work (which is finance/lending related) revolved around major financial institutions and banks. Last year I was staffed on a microfinance transaction. This introduced me to the concept and captured both my interest and imagination and I wanted to learn more. After reading/doing research on the subject, I truly believe that this is a wonderful way in which to help individuals and communities change their lives. It is not charity, it is empowerment. A small amount can make a huge difference. Microfinance enables a borrower to take control of his or her own life and live with dignity.
The return I get from this is knowing that I am trying to help in a positive, constructive manner. This may not be a panacea, but it is definitely a start.

lender.name: Pamela
lender.loan_because: This is such a wonderful idea! What a joy to be able to help someone a world away.

lender.name: JuliannaMara
lender.loan_because: I have travelled and seen the struggles that many individuals/families face today in developing countries. To live and to speak with them helped me to truly see their deep heartfelt desire and humbleness to survive and support their families and livelihood with honesty no matter how hard the work maybe. All in the world do not carry these qualities but those that do you will know and see it in their eyes, and are worthy of our love and attention by any means that we can help... AND KIVA IS TRULY ONE OF THOSE MEANS TO ACCOMPLISH THIS!
lender.occupational_info: I am a free-lance photographer with a passion for wildlife and cultural photography, and Africa is where I got my start. However, my degree and field specialty is as a forensic photographer and crime scene investigator.

lender.name: Rob
lender.loan_because:
Jesus Christ calls us to serve the poor in Matthew 25:34-40.
Then the King will say to those on his right, "Come, you who are blessed by my Father; take your inheritance, the kingdom prepared for you since the creation of the world. For I was hungry and you gave me something to eat, I was thirsty and you gave me something to drink, I was a stranger and you invited me in, I needed clothes and you clothed me, I was sick and you looked after me, I was in prison and you came to visit me." Then the righteous will answer him, "Lord, when did we see you hungry and feed you, or thirsty and give you something to drink? When did we see you a stranger and invite you in, or needing clothes and clothe you? When did we see you sick or in prison and go to visit you?" The King will reply, "I tell you the truth, whatever you did for one of the least of these brothers of mine, you did for me."
I like loaning through Christian microfinance organizations because it can tend to both the spiritual and physical needs of the poor.
May Christ be glorified and may many come to know him!

lender.name: brigid
lender.loan_because: i belive what goes around comes aroud!
lender.occupational_info: i spend a lot of time taking notes and doing homework.

lender.name: Faith Sloan
lender.loan_because: Thanks to the Lord and King of Kings, I can.
lender.occupational_info:
I simply use my talents to make loads of money so I can use it for charitable acts and for fine dining and good wine.
Check out http://www.buildyourchannel.com

lender.name: christopher
lender.loan_because: I'm here to help. NYHC style.
lender.occupational_info: Responsible for the protection and safety of medical staff, patients and visitors at a major university hospital.

lender.name: Rae
lender.loan_because: I like to bless other people.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of sick and wounded people in the US armed services. Kind of like a nurse.

lender.name: Josh
lender.loan_because: I feel it's important to use the money I have to bless others.
lender.occupational_info: I spend my days helping troubled children become well.

lender.name: Edd
lender.loan_because: its a easy way to help people to help themselves in areas that matter to me personally - for me cycling and computers!
lender.occupational_info: I generate new business ideas and feedback to our head office how people are using technology in Great Britain.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I can!

lender.name: Ili
lender.loan_because: ..."today for you, tomorrow for me".

lender.name: Peter & Kaydee
lender.loan_because: We want to make a direct connection to the recipient of our loan.
lender.occupational_info: Social workers serve individuals, communities, and social systems in pursuit of justice and wellness for all people. City planners build livable communities socially, economically, and environmentally with good physical design.

lender.name: Salmaan
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I advise a large bank on business use of technology

lender.name: The Gehue Family
lender.loan_because: Understanding the value of micro financing, we are happy to have the opportunity to contribute to improving the lives of others.

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: Such a fantastic idea, and a small way I can help.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: I appreciate and respect people that work hard, but just need a little bit of help helping themselves. Loaning money is the least I can do.

lender.name: Duncan
lender.loan_because: I lend because I believe in capitalism. I believe in the human desire to improve.

lender.name: Chia-Hui
lender.occupational_info: A full time student in the United States but loves everything from her country Taiwan.

lender.name: sina
lender.loan_because: giving to other people makes me very happy. I believe we all need to help each other for a better world.

lender.name: Ramon
lender.loan_because: These loans contribute to the growth of their personal and local economies, and ultimately to the improvement of their communities
lender.occupational_info: MBA student with concentration on Technology and Entrepreneurship

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: I like the fact that Kiva allows me to help others across the world make a life for themselves.

lender.name: Michel V.
lender.loan_because: We are in this world to help each other if we can.
lender.occupational_info: I own a french restaurant.

lender.name: Glen
lender.loan_because: From those to whom much has been given much is to be expected.

lender.name: Keith
lender.occupational_info: I teach art to urban high school students in a free after school program.

lender.name: Brigitte & Werner E.
lender.loan_because: We can help so much with a little bit of money. Isn´t it wonderful??
lender.occupational_info: I work in an insurance and have 1 husband and 1 daughter with 15 years.

lender.name: Ida
lender.loan_because: I can and therefore I should

lender.name: Emma
lender.loan_because:
it is fun!
It is also an honor to be a part of such a meaningful investment!
"A new command I give you: Love one another. As I have loved you, so you must love one another. By this all men will know that you are my disciples..." --Jesus

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: Lending via Kiva is a great way to make a positive contribution to the betterment of mankind. Given the ability to do so, why would one not participate?
lender.occupational_info: During my working years I designed mobile radio communication equipment. In retirement I am trying to document some of the history of radio communication.

lender.name: Roger Claessen
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of individuals
lender.occupational_info: Business consultancy to change and optimize working processes and supporting IT systems

lender.name: Miranda
lender.loan_because: I want to share my blessings.

lender.name: Sandra
lender.loan_because: A good exercise for the heart is to bend down and help another up.
lender.occupational_info: Planning and organizing large art exhibition projects and events.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I raise funds to help young people in the UK understand and care for the environment.

lender.name: Richard and Tawanna
lender.occupation: Him: Software Engineer Her: Creative Homemaker
lender.loan_because: Basically we want to help others in need. Helping others with a greater need gives us an unshakable joy. $25.00 is less than a tank of gas nowadays! The creators of Kiva.org have come up with a brilliant way to reach those we wouldn't. We are glad to be a part of it. Please spread the word!
lender.occupational_info: Richard is a Software Engineer for a large company. He also does Independent Software Development. Tawanna is an Independent Graphic Designer with a recent interest in Photography. We are also a home schooling family. Both have a Bachelors Degree and place a high value on education. You may see Tawanna's portfolio of work by the website. Tawanna also has a photo blog at http://bytesoflight.blogspot.com/

lender.name: Ursula
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves her/his dreams to come true. Kiva makes a world of difference- literally. Plus, I'm so blessed, how can I not give?

lender.name: Turner Family
lender.loan_because: My family and I want to help others make a better life for themselves.

lender.name: Molly
lender.loan_because: I think it's an amazing way to let others put your money to work while bettering their own lives.

lender.name: Anita
lender.loan_because: We are fortunate to have so much and want to help those that have so little.
lender.occupational_info: I am a stay at home mom to three great boys. I homeschool my children and love educating them myself. I like to garden and I am working on a vegetable garden. We are vegetarians and my boys sure like to eat their veggies.

lender.name: Ehren
lender.loan_because: Of all the time I spend on the Internet, Kiva may be the most worthwhile.
lender.occupational_info: fascinated by life intrigued by people work allows me to enjoy more of both.

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: I've always had the support of others around me.
lender.occupational_info: I invest in entrepreneurs and help them grow their businesses in the retail & consumer space.

lender.name: Antje
lender.whereabouts: valle gran rey Santa Cruz de Tenerife
lender.loan_because: ì am living on the canarian islands and here we can see every day the boatpeople coming from africa.
lender.occupational_info: owner of a t-shirt shop

lender.name: Andrew, Rebecca & Bailey
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of people to accomplish all that they dream, support their families with perseverance and hard work, educate their children, and ultimately be in a position to help others to do the same.
lender.occupational_info: I am a sales & marketing executive, and an aspiring entrepreneur. I pursue smart business opportunities, create and sell products, seek out customers and service my customers so that they may also expand their businesses and livelihood.

lender.name: Jacqui
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to realise their dream and thanks to Kiva I have been given the opportunity to be able to help.
lender.occupational_info: I live in a small rural town and love to travel overseas when I can. I really enjoy meeting people of different nationalities and cultures.

lender.name: Yvonne
lender.loan_because: God continues to bless me every day and the only way to thank him is by paying it forward.

lender.name: mark
lender.loan_because: It's another way of helping.

lender.name: Thor Christensen
lender.loan_because: The world has too many poor people. I am fortunate enough to have money to spare. I want to give poor people a chance to make a better life for themselves. Thank you, kiva.org team, for giving me this opportunity.

lender.name: Stacey
lender.loan_because: Life has given me many opportunities, it is only fair that others get some as well.
lender.occupational_info: I study biology at university. I hope to become a doctor in the future.

lender.name: Maxine & Camille
lender.loan_because: because as a women I wanted to help other women who are not as fortunate as women in the USA. I feel every women in the world deserves a chance to be successful.
lender.occupational_info: I was an office manager when I did work. Now I am at home enjoying my retirement with my husband.

lender.name: Madelyn
lender.loan_because: I loan because I think that Kiva can help others who are less fortunate than we are, and you make a difference in their life.

lender.name: Sonja
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I help people find information.

lender.name: Linda
lender.occupational_info: I teach children how to read and write well.

lender.name: Shivam
lender.loan_because: I have the money and want to lend it to domeone who needs it
lender.occupational_info: I study at the moment

lender.name: Todd
lender.loan_because: I want to raise the lowest standard of living.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently a student at a university. I work at a store that sells board games.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: our hope is that these loans give a shared opportunity and social justice over time to a small region not just to an individual.
lender.occupational_info:
I design and then build electrical projects for hospitals and industrial facilities. An example of a project would consist of installing an emergency system using multiple gas driven generators to support critical equipment during an electrical power outage.
I have 4 children and each of them know they can have any occupation they want but it needs to involve helping people!

lender.name: Ines
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves the chance to make a living for themselves and this is an awesome way to help others succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the sector of renewable energies ... a job, that makes me very happy.

lender.name: Eat Free All Week Team
lender.loan_because: We have a beautiful daughter adopted from Guatemala. On our visit there, I was amazed at the ingenuity and hard work of people doing everything they can to support their families.

lender.name: Cesca
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance!

lender.name: Kunal and Nisha
lender.loan_because: We want to help support others in need.
lender.occupational_info: We collect bottles and cans, and recycle them for money. We decided to use 100% of this money to help charities.

lender.name: Julian
lender.loan_because: I feel blessed and I want to give back. I believe that improving the lives of poor women is the best way to bring down the rate of human population growth, preserve wildlife, and promote peace.
